documents.document: I would prefer just about any job over being a red state dem senator for the next two years good lord
@zachdd you clearly didn't read their manifesto
Likewise, the left should resist mightily the urge to adopt the new Trumpian rules of politics in order to win back a majority
The right shouldn't abandon or neglect constitutional norms for the sake of a policy agenda trump can help deliver.
The most important idea presented is: rules matter more than outcomes in democracy. Once abandoned, theyll be immensely difficult to recover
